dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 876 IH: To amend the Defense Base Act to exclude Guam.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Moylan introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and Workforce

form.official-title: To amend the Defense Base Act to exclude Guam.

section.header: Inapplicability of Defense Base Act to Guam
section.text: Subsection (b) of section 1 of the Defense Base Act (Chapter 357; 55 Stat. 622; 42 U.S.C. 1651) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in paragraph (4), by striking the period at the end and inserting and Guam;; and
by adding at the end the following new paragraph:
the term Territory or possession outside the continental United States does not include Guam.
